TEXT: e1: The choice of an attending physician is at the discretion of the patient.

TEXT: e2: Yet the funds of the health insurance companies are a common benefit for all premium payers.

TEXT: e3: They should not be spent on personal preferences without proven use.
e4: The effectiveness of many natural remedies has not been demonstrated.
e5: Therefore no unproven and unrecognized treatments by naturopaths should be reimbursed by the insurance companies.
